title: Hello, World!
content:
This is my first post on this site. Nice!
I am setting up this site as a place for some of my thoughts, writings, and notes on various things. I intend to keep this site more up-to-date than I have my previous attempts at sites.

title: About Me
content: I am a university student studying Mathematics and Computer Science. I promise I will update this description soon, I just want this site to build first.
